txt.en: The leaders of Saruman's experiments become stronger as you defeat their minions.
Defeat both Troll bosses in each wing (Tier 4 Fumes and Haze active)

Do not defeat the leaders of the Abominations and Fire-orcs in the Pits of Isengard until in Tier 4 of Choking Haze and Toxic Fumes.  Killing the fire and abomination monsters will advance the tier of the effect.
